query: SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'projects' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('deletedAt', 'deletedBy', 'status');
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2g8chP3aro94bni.root --database XnmtZZwX6e46H8JVZbq4Ta --execute SELECT COLUMN_NAME, DATA_TYPE, IS_NULLABLE FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'projects' AND COLUMN_NAME IN ('deletedAt', 'deletedBy', 'status');
stdout:
COLUMN_NAME	DATA_TYPE	IS_NULLABLE
status	enum	NO
deletedAt	timestamp	YES
deletedBy	int	YES
